topic.title: Appendix CList of amendments issued in 2020

body.p: Table C lists the main amendments to IFRS 17 issued in June 2020 with a reference to the rationale for those amendments included in this Basis for Conclusions (see paragraphs BC6A‒BC6C).

li.p: made minor amendments to correct cases in which the drafting of IFRS 17 did not achieve the Board’s intended outcome; and
considered but rejected other amendments suggested by stakeholders—for example, suggestions to amend the annual cohort requirement (see paragraphs BC139A‒BC139T).
